Body: All employees are eligible for health insurance after they have worked for the company for at least one year.
Medical insurance covers only one routine physical per year.

Medical insurance is free for the single employee.  If the employee has a spouse, it is an additional $500 per month charge to cover the spouse.   A family plan that includes both the spouse and any children is $700 per month.
All of our pizzas are made with Dough, Tomato Sauce, Mozzarella Cheese.  Optional toppings include any one or all of sausage, pepperoni, pineapple, or anchovies.
We sell the following beverages only:  Coke, Sprite, Water, and Iced Tea
A gluten free pizza is also offered.
